name: So... I Dated a Horrid Spider
name_original: So... I Dated a Horrid Spider
description:
Creepy? Crawly? CUTE!!!

Did you ever want to date the ever so popular Horrid Spider? Now you can! Sit down and have lunch with this wonderful man while a dystopian future where your every move is monitored digitally and super AIs pair you off with others via apps.

Thanks to Jim Sterling for putting on the Horrid Spider Unity Asset contest .
